Wikipedia	http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Equinox_(film)

Low budget ($6500) Horror/SciFi film with great special effects. Stop motion animation. 

One of the world&#039;s finest stop-motion animators, the late David Allen played a significant creative role in every stunning creature effect seen in Equinox.

Four friends are attacked by a demon while on a picnic, due to possession of a tome of mystic information. Told in flashbacks by the sole survivor.  Written by Todd Schoonover

Four teenagers go on a woods hike and encounter a creepy forest ranger and a crazy old man. The old man is a scientist who had found a mysterious book bound in human skin, the Necronomicon, and when he had read its cryptic symbols it conjured monsters into existence. The teenagers keep the book, and are then persued by monsters, a demonic cult, and the ranger. The ranger turns out to be a red flying devil in human disguise.
